name: Knightmare (itch) (GlowingLegends)
description: The game Knightmare is a single player game that involves a thief, Enderon, trying to obtain a magical crystal orb within a dungeon deep in a forest. Little does Enderon know ghostly knights known as Wraith Knight are patrolling the forgotten dungeon killing anyone after their treasure. Will Enderon become their next prey?
